dmca.title: Complaint that ThePlanet's customer is a habitual copyright abuser
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 16, 2005 10:20 AM
To: ceronomus@comcast.net
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Problem User

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Bob Brinkman ceronomus@comcast.net
To: abuse@theplanet.com, support@kontent.de
Date: Monday, February 14, 2005, 4:04:09 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Problem User

===8<==============Original message text===============
From thePlanet.com's ToS

(iii) violates the rights of any person

Linda Antonsson, one of the operators of http://www.westeros.org routinely
attacks the rights of others by making bogus claims of violations of "her"
copyrights in attempts to have service providers pull down web pages. The
'Copyright' she speaks of is text that was used in a creative endeavor that
involved well over one hundred people, of which her contribution is merely a
small part. The exact text she is protecting  can be found at
http://www.westeros.org/Misc/AlterEgo/Angharad.html

International copyright law does not recognize the "rights" that she often
attempts to invoke with what is technically an addition to teh public
domain, despite her claims of holding copyright. In addition, even IF this
were copyrighted material, she threatens legal action when a website merely
links to her page, which is open for public viewing.

Quite honestly, this woman has a long history of threatening anyone in the
on-line community who disagrees with her 'talent' and she is a running joke,
but a very vocal running joke who threatens lawsuits every chance she gets
in hopes of making ISPs back down.

I send this letter in hopes of getting a very sincere point across. Linda
Antonsson is threatening legal action that she cannot take. She is not to be
taken seriously and giving in to her demands only makes her percieved legal
claim stronger, while it really has no grounds at all.

===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCE3LJvK/XpJs6oyURAhQlAJ0TAlKZDy9wAZdkNVMlNx6CTDXZywCffJwL
nBfMshcucycsMsPRDAXNk44=
=lZtn
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
